input.sentences: the sailor stood by the boat
and he found a photo of her .
output.sentences: I found this old photo of my grandmother standing in front of a sailor boat many years ago.
My relatives outfits may have changed; but their personalities never did.
This is a photo of the ball my grandparents attended when they were still dating.
My grandmother was so beautiful when she was my age.
I am so glad I found all these old photos of my relatives.
